title: Ticket #4087: Java universe jobs always evicted at exit
description:
Java universe jobs run to completion, but are evicted because the starter can't open the jvm.start file. Starter exits with 

11/20/13 09:46:55 JavaProc: JVM exited normally with code 0
11/20/13 09:46:55 JavaProc: Wrapper did not leave start record.
11/20/13 09:46:55 JavaProc: I'll assume Java is misconfigured here.
remarks:
2013-Nov-20 11:14:41 by gthain:
The problem is that the scratch directory, where the jvm.start and java.end files are written to, is now mode 0700, as of condor V8.0.0. The starter tries to read these as user "condor", getting EPERM.

2013-Nov-20 15:17:29 by zmiller:
CODE REVIEW by zmiller: Looks good, ship it!
